markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Master Siege Engineer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3228) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 129</row>

**Archetype** [Artillerist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=115)

</column>

---

What you don't know about artillery isn't worth knowing and your mastery allows you to perform an impossible number of actions as part of a [siege weapon](/equipment/siege-weapons)'s crew. You're permanently [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32). You can only use the extra action to [Aim](/Rules.aspx?ID=1625) or [Launch](/Rules.aspx?ID=1626) a siege weapon.
name: Master Siege Engineer
